member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ProGrid.My.Resources.Resources.PublicKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <RSAKeyValue><Modulus>unkMsHp1z9biez0id8OCOuSmlwRJdfGiL+6hxdtfcna98+bdz2rVnhJxpd7KY119Zq9GbNHpcsBZQ9P1PmZdxDoifHsRlfoEXQ2EM5kFo3/qmDVtbnEK9lm12+dfibGZy0Q+p4jWnFVZ++mZbSNsYmGCGfFc08jgwsLSmXqs60M=</Modulus><Exponent>AQAB</Exponent></RSAKeyValue>.

member.summary: Enumeration of ProGrid column sizing methods.

member.name: T:ProGrid.ProGrid.ProGridStyle
member.summary: A Style specification for a given data column.

member.name: M:ProGrid.ProGrid.ProGridStyle.#ctor(ProGrid.ProGrid.ProGridStyleTypes,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Data.DataTable,System.String,System.String,System.String,ProGrid.ProGrid.ProGridSizingMethods,ProGrid.ProGrid.ProGridAlignmentStyles)
member.summary: Initializes a new data column Style.
member.param: The ProGridStyleTypes enumeration.
True if the data column is visible in the ProGrid.
True if the data column is editable.
For Numeric styles, sets the decimal places to display.
For Numeric styles, sets the minimum allowed value.
For Numeric styles, sets the maximum allowed value.
For String styles, sets the maximum character count.
For Dropdown styles, provides the selection list in a 1 or 2 column datatable.
A custom format string to apply to the column.
Hides cell contents of the data column and displays the specified text.
Sets the default file type extension to display contents in an external viewer.
Sets the ProGridSizingMethods enumeration for initial column sizing.
Sets the ProGridAlignmentMethods enumeration for column text alignment.

member.name: M:ProGrid.ProGrid.StyleSet(System.String,ProGrid.ProGrid.ProGridStyle)
member.summary: Sets the display style of a data column.
member.param: The name of the data table column to apply the Style.
A ProGridStyleTypes class specifying the column display style.
member.remarks: Note that styles conflicting with the underlying data type will be ignored.

member.name: M:ProGrid.ProGrid.StyleGet(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the display style of a data column.
member.param: The name of the data table column to apply the Style.
member.remarks: Note that incompatible style settings might be overridden.

member.name: M:ProGrid.ProGrid.StyleGet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the display style of a data column.
member.param: The index of the data table column.

member.name: M:ProGrid.ProGrid.StyleGet(System.Data.DataColumn)
member.summary: Returns the display style of a data column.
member.param: The name of the data table column.
